title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Syria 2010
yAxis: Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 1995 to 1999, roughly increasing from 1999 to 2000, roughly constant from 2000 to 2003, rapidly increasing from 2003 to 2008, and finally roughly constant from 2008 to 2009.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2007 and 2008.
The highest Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars, of value 53.94 was reached at Year 2009
Minimum Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars about 16.14 was reached at Year 1998
